questions.name: Which SQL function returns the number of rows?
Analyze the purpose of JOIN operations.
questions.solution: They combine data from multiple tables based on related fields.

questions.name: Create a SQL query using GROUP BY and HAVING.
questions.solution: SELECT dept, COUNT(*) FROM emp GROUP BY dept HAVING COUNT(*)>5;

questions.name: Explain why isolation levels matter.
questions.solution: They determine how concurrent transactions affect each other.

questions.name: Evaluate if READ UNCOMMITTED is safe for financial systems.
questions.solution: No, it risks dirty reads and inconsistent data.
